Class DNSSD

    DNSSD Manager

    Utility for DNS_SD services

    • Method Detail

      • registerService

        public void registerService(java.lang.String serviceType,
                            java.lang.String serviceName,
                            int port,
                            java.lang.String serviceDescription,
                            java.net.InetAddress address)
                     throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Register a DNS_SD service on the network.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - Service type to be registered. Must use valid service type, such as _html._tcp.local.
        serviceName - Name of the service being registered
        port - Port the service broadcasts
        serviceDescription - Description of the service being registered
        address - Address to register the service for. InetAddress.getLocalHost() is used if null is provided
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if unable to resolve localHost

      • discoverService

        public void discoverService(java.lang.String serviceType,
                            java.net.InetAddress address)
                     throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Discover a DNS_SD service on the network.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - Service type to be registered. Must use valid service type, such as _html._tcp.local.
        address - Address to start searching for service. InetAddress.getLocalHost() is used if null is provided
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if unable to resolve localHost

      • getServiceInfo

        public java.lang.String getServiceInfo()
        get the service info of a resolved service when discovering
        Returns:
        String service info of resolved service discovery

        public java.lang.String getServiceName()
        get the service name of a resolved service when discovering
        Returns:
        String service name of resolved service discovery
